column4: is a 64 bit Hardon in my best interests? will my 32 bit apps run ok?
they could have picked a better name :(
I can buy more in a hearbit
complain to Adobe, who make no 64-bit Flash plugin for any platform
ok lets pretend I have 4 GB of ram, are there any disadvantages to 64 bit?
no Flash. few third party native packages.
